mapper.select: SELECT notice_title, notice_content,notice_no,notice_reg,notice_cnt FROM notice WHERE notice_no =#{notice_no}
SELECT * FROM notice order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
UPDATE notice SET notice_cnt=notice_cnt+1 where notice_no=#{notice_no}
